items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great wrap with arm holes
items.body: Love the neutral color, nice, loose and light weight! So cute to wear with lots of things! Read more
items.author: Terrie Shulko

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cozy and cute!
items.body: This has become my new favorite sweater üòç it‚Äôs thin, so if you‚Äôre going for extreme warmth, this won‚Äôt do much. Also pockets are always a plus. It‚Äôs comfy and soft to wear at home or as a casual work sweater. Read more
items.author: Lindsey Campbell

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Cute lightweight cardigan.
items.body: It is a very cute cardigan, but sleeves are oddly short. It is see thru and lightweight. Pockets are in a strange place but it is comfortable and soft. Read more
items.author: Marlene McNamara

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect fit
items.body: I love the look and feel of this cardigan! It fits perfectly. Read more
items.author: HH

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Size up for photo-fit. More like a lightweight cover-up than a sweater.
items.body: This is less like a lightweight sweater and more like a lightweight cover up. Just because it's a knit textile doesn't qualify it as a sweater, IMO. I'm sitting here in my house at 66 deg F, feeling chilly with it on as I write this review. And I don't run cold. Also, it is so not flattering. Unless you are a tall, slight-figured, lady with wide shoulders (to enhance the drapery effect), it probably won't look like the pic on you either. I ordered the dusty green - the color is fantastic, my photos don't do it justice. I ordered an XL, which should've fit loosely on me, based off their size chart, which is representative of my standard size. I'm a 38DDD, 44" chest, 17" shoulder, 35" waist, 46" hip. It's a weird fit. It feels like there isn't enough fabric on the back half. It's also not flattering - the swoop and pockets don't fall low enough for it to hit the sweet spot, and you just end up looking oompa-loompah-esque. See pics - I included ones to prove I am not shaped like a baloon. It needs to be longer, and so do the sleeves - it's not shown to be a 3/4 sleeve type cardigan, but that's what you get. On rare moments, the sleeve might reach down to your wrist, but as soon as you move, it's up your forearm again. Back to the pockets - because they sewed them into the seam, and even failed to angle them appropriately, you just end up with bulgey side-balloon. If you're gonna buy it, definitely size up, even if you're slight-of-frame, if you want hope to acheive the effect the pic is showing. The biggest issue is the overall length (hence, where the drapery falls) and the way pockets are done. I would've felt better about this purchase if it were less expensive - I'll pay $30-40 on a sweater, but not a lightweight cover up. More like a $15-20 item. Read more
items.author: BellyGremlin

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Pretty, comfy, POCKETS!
items.body: These are so comfy and snuggly, not to mention pretty! They have pockets!!! And it's a really great price. Highly recommend! Read more
items.author: Sharon Robertson

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Stylish and Light
items.body: I grabbed this in order to have a sweater to throw on quickly. It looked oversized, which was what I wanted. I'm so happy that it's true. It's very lightweight and I don't feel like this is the first sweater I'd grab if I was freezing and needed to warm up. It is, however, very soft and perfect for throwing on if you get chilly. Read more
items.author: Rachel Miller

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Wine, Brown, Blue, Apricot, Hot Pink, Black, Dusty Green, Sage, Taro, Dark Green, Olive, Navy, White, Beige. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
